title: "Chicago AI startup acquired by New York consulting firm"
excerpt: "A Chicago artificial intelligence startup led by former executives at Mu Sigma has been acquired by consulting firm Fractal. New York-based Fractal said Tuesday that it has purchased Samya.ai, a Chicago startup that uses artificial intelligence to help CPG brands recapture lost revenue."
